publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2159 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Rooting Out Racism Initiative—That the Parliament recognises the significant contribution being made by the local authorities, police and health trusts in Lothian in launching their initiative "Rooting Out Racism" and commends the joint approach as a model to other bodies across Scotland. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick*

S1M-2159 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Rooting Out Racism Initiative-That the Parliament recognises the significant contribution being made by the local authorities, police and health trusts in Lothian in launching their initiative "Rooting Out Racism" and commends the joint approach as a model to other bodies across Scotland. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick
S1M-2159 Rooting Out Racism Initiative (lodged on 4 September 2001) Robin Harper*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-2159 Rooting Out Racism Initiative (lodged on 4 September 2001) Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Elaine Smith*
S1M-2159 Rooting Out Racism Initiative (lodged on 4 September 2001) Trish Godman*

S1M-2159 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Rooting Out Racism Initiative—That the Parliament recognises the significant contribution being made by the local authorities, police and health trusts in Lothian in launching their initiative "Rooting Out Racism" and commends the joint approach as a model to other bodies across Scotland. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Robin Harper, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Elaine Smith, Trish Godman, Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-2159 Rooting Out Racism Initiative (lodged on 4 September 2001) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2159 Rooting Out Racism Initiative (lodged on 4 September 2001) Cathy Peattie*

S1M-2159 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Rooting Out Racism Initiative-That the Parliament recognises the significant contribution being made by the local authorities, police and health trusts in Lothian in launching their initiative "Rooting Out Racism" and commends the joint approach as a model to other bodies across Scotland. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Robin Harper, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Elaine Smith, Trish Godman, Mr Michael McMahon, Irene Oldfather, Cathy Peattie, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2159 Rooting Out Racism Initiative (lodged on 4 September 2001) Cathy Jamieson*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Karen Whitefield*, Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-2159 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Rooting Out Racism Initiative-That the Parliament recognises the significant contribution being made by the local authorities, police and health trusts in Lothian in launching their initiative "Rooting Out Racism" and commends the joint approach as a model to other bodies across Scotland. Supported by: Brian Fitzpatrick, Robin Harper, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Elaine Smith, Trish Godman, Mr Michael McMahon, Irene Oldfather, Cathy Peattie, Maureen Macmillan, Cathy Jamieson, Mr John Home Robertson, Karen Whitefield, Mr Jamie Stone
